title: Riot, please DON'T remove Qiyana's jungling capabilities
body:
The majority of people I've seen playing Qiyana have been playing her jungle instead of mid and have really enjoyed it, including myself. There is no reason to remove her jungling capabilities unless you want to anger a majority of the few Qiyana players that actually exist right now (For real, noone really seems to be playing her).

That's all I have to say. Please let her remain viable in the jungle.
